verses.arabic: طه
verses.arabicSimple: طه
verses.translation: Ta, Ha.
verses.transliteration: Taa-Haa

verses.arabic: مَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِتَشْقَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: مَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِتَشْقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: We have not sent down to you the Qur'an that you be distressed
verses.transliteration: Maaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Qur-aana litashqaaa

verses.arabic: إِلَّا تَذْكِرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: إِلَّا تَذْكِرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: But only as a reminder for those who fear [Allah] -
verses.transliteration: Illaa tazkiratal limany yakshaa

verses.arabic: تَنزِيلًا مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلْعُلَى
verses.arabicSimple: تَنزِيلًا مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلْعُلَى
verses.translation: A revelation from He who created the earth and highest heavens,
verses.transliteration: Tanzeelam mimman khalaqal arda was samaawaatil 'ulaa

verses.arabic: ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱسْتَوَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱسْتَوَىٰ
verses.translation: The Most Merciful [who is] above the Throne established.
verses.transliteration: Ar-Rahmaanu 'alal 'Arshis tawaa

verses.arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحْتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحْتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
verses.translation: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth and what is between them and what is under the soil.
verses.transliteration: Lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa maa tahtassaraa

verses.arabic: وَإِن تَجْهَرْ بِٱلْقَوْلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخْفَى
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِن تَجْهَرْ بِٱلْقَوْلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخْفَى
verses.translation: And if you speak aloud - then indeed, He knows the secret and what is [even] more hidden.
verses.transliteration: Wa in tajhar bilqawli fainnahoo ya'lamus sirra wa akhfaa

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.
verses.transliteration: Allaahu laaa ilasha illaa Huwa lahul Asmaaa'ul Husnaa

segments.arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ
segments.translation: Allah there is no god except Him
segments.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa

segments.arabic: لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
segments.translation: To Him belong the Names the Most Beautiful
segments.transliteration: lahu l-asmāu l-ḥus'nā

verses.arabic: وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And has the story of Moses reached you? -
verses.transliteration: Wa hal ataaka hadeesu Moosa

verses.arabic: إِذْ رَءَا نَارًا فَقَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ ٱمْكُثُوٓا۟ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا لَّعَلِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوْ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدًى
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ رَءَا نَارًا فَقَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ ٱمْكُثُوٓا۟ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا لَّعَلِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوْ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدًى
verses.translation: When he saw a fire and said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire; perhaps I can bring you a torch or find at the fire some guidance."
verses.transliteration: Iz ra aa naaran faqaala li alhlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la'alleee aateekum minhaa biqabasin aw ajidu 'alan naari hudaa

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَتَىٰهَا نُودِىَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَمَّآ أَتَىٰهَا نُودِىَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And when he came to it, he was called, "O Moses,
verses.transliteration: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya yaa Moosaa

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.arabicSimple: إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: Indeed, I am your Lord, so remove your sandals. Indeed, you are in the sacred valley of Tuwa.
verses.transliteration: Inneee Ana Rabbuka fakhla' na'laika innaka bilwaadil muqaddasi Tuwaa

segments.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ ۖ
segments.translation: Indeed, [I] I Am your Lord so remove your shoes
segments.transliteration: innī anā rabbuka fa-ikh'laʿ naʿlayka

segments.arabic: إِنَّكَ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
segments.translation: Indeed, you are in the valley the sacred of Tuwa
segments.transliteration: innaka bil-wādi l-muqadasi ṭuwan

verses.arabic: وَأَنَا ٱخْتَرْتُكَ فَٱسْتَمِعْ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَنَا ٱخْتَرْتُكَ فَٱسْتَمِعْ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you].
verses.transliteration: Wa anakhtartuka fastami' limaa yoohaa

verses.arabic: إِنَّنِىٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدْنِى وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكْرِىٓ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّنِىٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدْنِى وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكْرِىٓ
verses.translation: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
verses.transliteration: Innaneee Anal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Ana fa'budnee wa aqimis-salaata lizikree

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.
verses.transliteration: Innas Saa'ata aatiyatun akaadu ukhfeehaa litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa tas'aa

verses.arabic: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنْهَا مَن لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرْدَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنْهَا مَن لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرْدَىٰ
verses.translation: So do not let one avert you from it who does not believe in it and follows his desire, for you [then] would perish.
verses.transliteration: Falaa yasuddannnaka 'anhaa mal laa yu'minu bihaa wattaba'a hawaahu fatardaa

verses.arabic: وَمَا تِلْكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا تِلْكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: And what is that in your right hand, O Moses?"
verses.transliteration: Wa maa tilka bi yamee nika yaa Moosaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ هِىَ عَصَاىَ أَتَوَكَّؤُا۟ عَلَيْهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِى وَلِىَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ هِىَ عَصَاىَ أَتَوَكَّؤُا۟ عَلَيْهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِى وَلِىَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: He said, "It is my staff; I lean upon it, and I bring down leaves for my sheep and I have therein other uses."
verses.transliteration: Qaala hiya 'asaaya atawakka'u alaihaa wa ahushshu bihaa 'alaa ghanamee wa liya feehaa ma aaribu ukhraa

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَلْقِهَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ أَلْقِهَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "Throw it down, O Moses."
verses.transliteration: Qaala alqihaa yaa Moosaa

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰهَا فَإِذَا هِىَ حَيَّةٌ تَسْعَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَلْقَىٰهَا فَإِذَا هِىَ حَيَّةٌ تَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly.
verses.transliteration: Fa-alqaahaa fa -izaa hiya haiyatun tas'aa

verses.arabic: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْ ۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْ ۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition.
verses.transliteration: Qaala khuzhaa wa laa ta khaf sanu'eeduhaa seeratahal oolaa

segments.arabic: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْ ۖ
segments.translation: He said Seize it and do not fear
segments.transliteration: qāla khudh'hā walā takhaf

segments.arabic: سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ
segments.translation: We will return it to its state the former
segments.transliteration: sanuʿīduhā sīratahā l-ūlā

verses.arabic: وَٱضْمُمْ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱضْمُمْ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And draw in your hand to your side; it will come out white without disease - another sign,
verses.transliteration: Wadmum yadaka ilaa janaahika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in Aayatan ukhraa

verses.arabic: لِنُرِيَكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ٱلْكُبْرَى
verses.arabicSimple: لِنُرِيَكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ٱلْكُبْرَى
verses.translation: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs.
verses.transliteration: Linuriyaka min Aayaatinal Kubra

verses.arabic: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed."
verses.transliteration: Izhab ilaa Fir'awna innahoo taghaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbish rah lee sadree

verses.arabic: وَيَسِّرْ لِىٓ أَمْرِى
verses.arabicSimple: وَيَسِّرْ لِىٓ أَمْرِى
verses.translation: And ease for me my task
verses.transliteration: Wa yassir leee amree

verses.arabic: وَٱحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِّن لِّسَانِى
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِّن لِّسَانِى
verses.translation: And untie the knot from my tongue
verses.transliteration: Wahlul 'uqdatam milli saanee

verses.arabic: يَفْقَهُوا۟ قَوْلِى
verses.arabicSimple: يَفْقَهُوا۟ قَوْلِى
verses.translation: That they may understand my speech.
verses.transliteration: Yafqahoo qawlee

verses.arabic: وَٱجْعَل لِّى وَزِيرًا مِّنْ أَهْلِى
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱجْعَل لِّى وَزِيرًا مِّنْ أَهْلِى
verses.translation: And appoint for me a minister from my family -
verses.transliteration: Waj'al lee wazeeram min ahlee

verses.arabic: هَـٰرُونَ أَخِى
verses.arabicSimple: هَـٰرُونَ أَخِى
verses.translation: Aaron, my brother.
verses.transliteration: Haaroona akhee

verses.arabic: ٱشْدُدْ بِهِۦٓ أَزْرِى
verses.arabicSimple: ٱشْدُدْ بِهِۦٓ أَزْرِى
verses.translation: Increase through him my strength
verses.transliteration: Ushdud biheee azree

verses.arabic: وَأَشْرِكْهُ فِىٓ أَمْرِى
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَشْرِكْهُ فِىٓ أَمْرِى
verses.translation: And let him share my task
verses.transliteration: Wa ashrik hu feee amree

verses.arabic: كَىْ نُسَبِّحَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: كَىْ نُسَبِّحَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: That we may exalt You much
verses.transliteration: Kai nusabbihaka kaseeraa

verses.arabic: وَنَذْكُرَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَنَذْكُرَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: And remember You much.
verses.transliteration: Wa nazkuraka kaseeraa

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ كُنتَ بِنَا بَصِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّكَ كُنتَ بِنَا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing."
verses.transliteration: Innaka kunta binaa baseeraa

verses.arabic: قَالَ قَدْ أُوتِيتَ سُؤْلَكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ قَدْ أُوتِيتَ سُؤْلَكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "You have been granted your request, O Moses.
verses.transliteration: Qaala qad ooteeta su'laka yaa Moosaa

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَيْكَ مَرَّةً أُخْرَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَيْكَ مَرَّةً أُخْرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad manannaa 'alaika marratan ukhraaa

verses.arabic: إِذْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.translation: When We inspired to your mother what We inspired,
verses.transliteration: Iz awhainaaa ilaaa ummika maa yoohaaa

verses.arabic: أَنِ ٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ فَلْيُلْقِهِ ٱلْيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأْخُذْهُ عَدُوٌّ لِّى وَعَدُوٌّ لَّهُۥ ۚ وَأَلْقَيْتُ عَلَيْكَ مَحَبَّةً مِّنِّى وَلِتُصْنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيْنِىٓ
verses.arabicSimple: أَنِ ٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ فَلْيُلْقِهِ ٱلْيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأْخُذْهُ عَدُوٌّ لِّى وَعَدُوٌّ لَّهُۥ ۚ وَأَلْقَيْتُ عَلَيْكَ مَحَبَّةً مِّنِّى وَلِتُصْنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيْنِىٓ
verses.translation: [Saying], 'Cast him into the chest and cast it into the river, and the river will throw it onto the bank; there will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him.' And I bestowed upon you love from Me that you would be brought up under My eye.
verses.transliteration: Aniqzifeehi fit Taabooti faqzifeehi fil yammi fal yul qihil yammu bis saahili yaakhuzhu 'aduwwul lee wa 'aduwwul lah; wa alqaitu 'alaika mahabbatam minnee wa litusna'a 'alaa 'ainee

segments.arabic: أَنِ ٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ فَلْيُلْقِهِ ٱلْيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأْخُذْهُ عَدُوٌّ لِّى وَعَدُوٌّ لَّهُۥ ۚ
segments.translation: That cast him in the chest then cast it in the river then let cast it the river on the bank will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him
segments.transliteration: ani iq'dhifīhi fī l-tābūti fa-iq'dhifīhi fī l-yami falyul'qihi l-yamu bil-sāḥili yakhudh'hu ʿaduwwun lī waʿaduwwun lahu

segments.arabic: وَأَلْقَيْتُ عَلَيْكَ مَحَبَّةً مِّنِّى وَلِتُصْنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيْنِىٓ
segments.translation: And I cast over you love from Me and that you may be brought up under My eye
segments.transliteration: wa-alqaytu ʿalayka maḥabbatan minnī walituṣ'naʿa ʿalā ʿaynī

words.translation: and that you may be brought up

verses.arabic: إِذْ تَمْشِىٓ أُخْتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكْفُلُهُۥ ۖ فَرَجَعْنَـٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ ۚ وَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا فَنَجَّيْنَـٰكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونًا ۚ فَلَبِثْتَ سِنِينَ فِىٓ أَهْلِ مَدْيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئْتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٍ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ تَمْشِىٓ أُخْتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكْفُلُهُۥ ۖ فَرَجَعْنَـٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ ۚ وَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا فَنَجَّيْنَـٰكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونًا ۚ فَلَبِثْتَ سِنِينَ فِىٓ أَهْلِ مَدْيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئْتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٍ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: [And We favored you] when your sister went and said, 'Shall I direct you to someone who will be responsible for him?' So We restored you to your mother that she might be content and not grieve. And you killed someone, but We saved you from retaliation and tried you with a [severe] trial. And you remained [some] years among the people of Madyan. Then you came [here] at the decreed time, O Moses.
verses.transliteration: Iz tamsheee ukhtuka fataqoolu hal adullukum 'alaa mai yakfuluhoo faraja 'naaka ilaaa ummika kai taqarra 'ainuhaa wa laa tahzan; wa qatalta nafsan fanajjainaaka minal ghammi wa fatannaaka futoonaa; falabista sineena feee ahli Madyana summa ji'ta 'alaa qadariny yaa Moosa

segments.arabic: إِذْ تَمْشِىٓ أُخْتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكْفُلُهُۥ ۖ
segments.translation: When was going your sister and she said Shall I show you [to] one who will nurse and rear him
segments.transliteration: idh tamshī ukh'tuka fataqūlu hal adullukum ʿalā man yakfuluhu

segments.arabic: فَرَجَعْنَـٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ ۚ
segments.translation: So We returned you to your mother that may be cooled her eyes and not she grieves
segments.transliteration: farajaʿnāka ilā ummika kay taqarra ʿaynuhā walā taḥzana

segments.arabic: وَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا فَنَجَّيْنَـٰكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونًا ۚ
segments.translation: And you killed a man but We saved you from the distress and We tried you with a trial
segments.transliteration: waqatalta nafsan fanajjaynāka mina l-ghami wafatannāka futūnan

segments.arabic: فَلَبِثْتَ سِنِينَ فِىٓ أَهْلِ مَدْيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئْتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٍ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
segments.translation: Then you remained some years with the people of Madyan Then you came at the decreed time O Musa
segments.transliteration: falabith'ta sinīna fī ahli madyana thumma ji'ta ʿalā qadarin yāmūsā

verses.arabic: وَٱصْطَنَعْتُكَ لِنَفْسِى
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱصْطَنَعْتُكَ لِنَفْسِى
verses.translation: And I produced you for Myself.
verses.transliteration: Wastana' tuka linafsee

verses.arabic: ٱذْهَبْ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَا تَنِيَا فِى ذِكْرِى
verses.arabicSimple: ٱذْهَبْ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَا تَنِيَا فِى ذِكْرِى
verses.translation: Go, you and your brother, with My signs and do not slacken in My remembrance.
verses.transliteration: Izhab anta wa akhooka bi Aayaatee wa laa taniyaa fee zikree

verses.arabic: ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Go, both of you, to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
verses.transliteration: Izhabaaa ilaa Fir'awna innahoo taghaa

verses.arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوْلًا لَّيِّنًا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوْ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوْلًا لَّيِّنًا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوْ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And speak to him with gentle speech that perhaps he may be reminded or fear [Allah]."
verses.transliteration: Faqoolaa lahoo qawlal laiyinal la allahoo yatazakkkaru 'aw yakhshaa

verses.arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفْرُطَ عَلَيْنَآ أَوْ أَن يَطْغَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفْرُطَ عَلَيْنَآ أَوْ أَن يَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: They said, "Our Lord, indeed we are afraid that he will hasten [punishment] against us or that he will transgress."
verses.transliteration: Qaalaa Rabbanaaa innanaa nakhaafu ai yafruta 'alainaaa aw ai yatghaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ ۖ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ ۖ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
verses.transliteration: Qaala laa takhaafaaa innanee ma'akumaa asma'u wa araa

segments.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ ۖ
segments.translation: He said Do not fear
segments.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā

segments.arabic: إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
segments.translation: Indeed, I Am with you both I hear and I see
segments.transliteration: innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā

verses.arabic: فَأْتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبْهُمْ ۖ قَدْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۖ وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأْتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبْهُمْ ۖ قَدْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۖ وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.translation: So go to him and say, 'Indeed, we are messengers of your Lord, so send with us the Children of Israel and do not torment them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And peace will be upon he who follows the guidance.
verses.transliteration: Faatiyaahu faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolaa Rabbika fa arsil ma'anaa Banee Israaa'eela wa laa tu'azzibhum qad ji'naaka bi Aayatim mir Rabbika wassa laamu 'alaa manit taba'al hudaa

segments.arabic: فَأْتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبْهُمْ ۖ
segments.translation: So go to him and say Indeed, we both are Messengers of your Lord so send with us the Children of Israel the Children of Israel and do not torment them
segments.transliteration: fatiyāhu faqūlā innā rasūlā rabbika fa-arsil maʿanā banī is'rāīla walā tuʿadhib'hum

segments.arabic: قَدْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۖ
segments.translation: Verily we came to you with a Sign from your Lord
segments.transliteration: qad ji'nāka biāyatin min rabbika

segments.arabic: وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
segments.translation: And peace on one who follows the Guidance
segments.transliteration: wal-salāmu ʿalā mani ittabaʿa l-hudā

verses.arabic: إِنَّا قَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْنَآ أَنَّ ٱلْعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا قَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْنَآ أَنَّ ٱلْعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, it has been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies and turns away.' "
verses.transliteration: Innaa qad oohiya ilainaaa annnal 'azaaba 'alaa man kaz zaba wa tawalla

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَن رَّبُّكُمَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ فَمَن رَّبُّكُمَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala famar Rabbu kumaa yaa Moosa

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
verses.translation: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it]."
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbunal lazeee a'taa kulla shai'in khalqahoo summa hadaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا بَالُ ٱلْقُرُونِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ فَمَا بَالُ ٱلْقُرُونِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala famaa baalul quroonil oolaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَنسَى
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَنسَى
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabee fee kitaab, laa yadillu Rabbee wa laa yansaa

segments.arabic: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۖ
segments.translation: He said Its knowledge is with my Lord in a Record
segments.transliteration: qāla ʿil'muhā ʿinda rabbī fī kitābin

segments.arabic: لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَنسَى
segments.translation: Not errs my Lord and not forgets
segments.transliteration: lā yaḍillu rabbī walā yansā

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّن نَّبَاتٍ شَتَّىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّن نَّبَاتٍ شَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed [spread out] and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants.
verses.transliteration: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw wa salaka lakum feehaa subulanw wa anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa akhrajnaa biheee azwaajam min nabaatin shatta

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱرْعَوْا۟ أَنْعَـٰمَكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: كُلُوا۟ وَٱرْعَوْا۟ أَنْعَـٰمَكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
verses.translation: Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed, in that are signs for those of intelligence.
verses.transliteration: Kuloo war'aw an'aamakum; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil li ulin nuhaa

segments.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱرْعَوْا۟ أَنْعَـٰمَكُمْ ۗ
segments.translation: Eat and pasture your cattle
segments.transliteration: kulū wa-ir'ʿaw anʿāmakum

segments.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
segments.translation: Indeed in that surely are Signs for possessors of intelligence
segments.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī l-nuhā

verses.arabic: ۞ مِنْهَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمْ وَمِنْهَا نُخْرِجُكُمْ تَارَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ مِنْهَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمْ وَمِنْهَا نُخْرِجُكُمْ تَارَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time.
verses.transliteration: Minhaa khalaqnaakum wa feehaa nu'eedukum wa minhaa nukhrijukum taaratan ukhraa

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ أَرَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ
verses.translation: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad arainaahu Aayaatinaa kullahaa fakaz zaba wa abaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتُخْرِجَنَا مِنْ أَرْضِنَا بِسِحْرِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتُخْرِجَنَا مِنْ أَرْضِنَا بِسِحْرِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?
verses.transliteration: Qaala aji'tanaa litukhri janaa min ardinaa bisihrika yaa Moosa

verses.arabic: فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّكَ بِسِحْرٍ مِّثْلِهِۦ فَٱجْعَلْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّا نُخْلِفُهُۥ نَحْنُ وَلَآ أَنتَ مَكَانًا سُوًى
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّكَ بِسِحْرٍ مِّثْلِهِۦ فَٱجْعَلْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّا نُخْلِفُهُۥ نَحْنُ وَلَآ أَنتَ مَكَانًا سُوًى
verses.translation: Then we will surely bring you magic like it, so make between us and you an appointment, which we will not fail to keep and neither will you, in a place assigned."
verses.transliteration: Falanaatiyannaka bisihrim mislihee faj'al bainanaa wa bainaka maw'idal laa nukhlifuhoo nahnu wa laaa anta makaanan suwaa

words.translation: Then we will surely produce for you

verses.arabic: قَالَ مَوْعِدُكُمْ يَوْمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحْشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحًى
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ مَوْعِدُكُمْ يَوْمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحْشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحًى
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning."
verses.transliteration: Qaala maw'idukum yawmuz zeenati wa ai yuhsharan naasu duhaa

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيْدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيْدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ
verses.translation: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses].
verses.transliteration: Fatawallaa Fir'awnu fajjama'a kaidahoo summa ataa

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيْلَكُمْ لَا تَفْتَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا فَيُسْحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٍ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيْلَكُمْ لَا تَفْتَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا فَيُسْحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٍ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]."
verses.transliteration: Qaala lahum Moosaa wailakum laa taftaroo 'alal laahi kaziban fa yus hitakum bi 'azaab, wa qad khaaba manif taraa

segments.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيْلَكُمْ لَا تَفْتَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا فَيُسْحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٍ ۖ
segments.translation: Said to them Musa Woe to you Do not invent against Allah a lie lest He will destroy you with a punishment
segments.transliteration: qāla lahum mūsā waylakum lā taftarū ʿalā l-lahi kadhiban fayus'ḥitakum biʿadhābin

segments.arabic: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ
segments.translation: And verily he failed who invented
segments.transliteration: waqad khāba mani if'tarā

verses.arabic: فَتَنَـٰزَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَتَنَـٰزَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ
verses.translation: So they disputed over their affair among themselves and concealed their private conversation.
verses.transliteration: Fatanaaza'ooo amrahum bainahum wa asarrun najwaa

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَٰنِ لَسَـٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخْرِجَاكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِمَا وَيَذْهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلْمُثْلَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَٰنِ لَسَـٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخْرِجَاكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِمَا وَيَذْهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلْمُثْلَىٰ
verses.translation: They said, "Indeed, these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your most exemplary way.
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo in haaazaani lasaahiraani yureedaani ai yukhrijaakum min ardikum bisihrihimaa wa yazhabaa bitareeqatikumul muslaa

verses.arabic: فَأَجْمِعُوا۟ كَيْدَكُمْ ثُمَّ ٱئْتُوا۟ صَفًّا ۚ وَقَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مَنِ ٱسْتَعْلَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَجْمِعُوا۟ كَيْدَكُمْ ثُمَّ ٱئْتُوا۟ صَفًّا ۚ وَقَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مَنِ ٱسْتَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
verses.transliteration: Fa ajmi'oo kaidakum summma'too saffaa; wa qad aflahal yawma manis ta'laa

segments.arabic: فَأَجْمِعُوا۟ كَيْدَكُمْ ثُمَّ ٱئْتُوا۟ صَفًّا ۚ
segments.translation: So put together your plan then come in a line
segments.transliteration: fa-ajmiʿū kaydakum thumma i'tū ṣaffan

segments.arabic: وَقَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مَنِ ٱسْتَعْلَىٰ
segments.translation: And verily will be successful today who overcomes
segments.transliteration: waqad aflaḥa l-yawma mani is'taʿlā

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ
verses.translation: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa immaaa an tulqiya wa immaaa an nakoona awala man alqaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَلْ أَلْقُوا۟ ۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمْ وَعِصِيُّهُمْ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيْهِ مِن سِحْرِهِمْ أَنَّهَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ بَلْ أَلْقُوا۟ ۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمْ وَعِصِيُّهُمْ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيْهِ مِن سِحْرِهِمْ أَنَّهَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes].
verses.transliteration: Qaala bal alqoo fa izaa hibaaluhum wa 'isiyyuhum yuhaiyalu ilaihi min sihrihim annahaa tas'aa

segments.arabic: قَالَ بَلْ أَلْقُوا۟ ۖ
segments.translation: He said Nay you throw
segments.transliteration: qāla bal alqū

segments.arabic: فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمْ وَعِصِيُّهُمْ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيْهِ مِن سِحْرِهِمْ أَنَّهَا تَسْعَىٰ
segments.translation: Then behold Their ropes and their staffs seemed to him by their magic that they were moving
segments.transliteration: fa-idhā ḥibāluhum waʿiṣiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilayhi min siḥ'rihim annahā tasʿā

verses.arabic: فَأَوْجَسَ فِى نَفْسِهِۦ خِيفَةً مُّوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَوْجَسَ فِى نَفْسِهِۦ خِيفَةً مُّوسَىٰ
verses.translation: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses.
verses.transliteration: Fa awjasa fee nafsihee kheefatam Moosa

verses.arabic: قُلْنَا لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قُلْنَا لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.
verses.transliteration: Qulnaa laa takhaf innaka antal a'laa

verses.arabic: وَأَلْقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلْقَفْ مَا صَنَعُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّمَا صَنَعُوا۟ كَيْدُ سَـٰحِرٍ ۖ وَلَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلسَّاحِرُ حَيْثُ أَتَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَلْقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلْقَفْ مَا صَنَعُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّمَا صَنَعُوا۟ كَيْدُ سَـٰحِرٍ ۖ وَلَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلسَّاحِرُ حَيْثُ أَتَىٰ
verses.translation: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is."
verses.transliteration: Wa alqi maa fee yamee nika talqaf maa sana'oo; innamaa sana'oo kaidu saahir; wa laa yuflihus saahiru haisu ataa

segments.arabic: وَأَلْقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلْقَفْ مَا صَنَعُوٓا۟ ۖ
segments.translation: And throw what is in your right hand it will swallow up what they have made
segments.transliteration: wa-alqi mā fī yamīnika talqaf mā ṣanaʿū

segments.arabic: إِنَّمَا صَنَعُوا۟ كَيْدُ سَـٰحِرٍ ۖ
segments.translation: Only they have made a trick of a magician
segments.transliteration: innamā ṣanaʿū kaydu sāḥirin

segments.arabic: وَلَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلسَّاحِرُ حَيْثُ أَتَىٰ
segments.translation: and not will be successful the magician wherever he comes
segments.transliteration: walā yuf'liḥu l-sāḥiru ḥaythu atā

verses.arabic: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَـٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَـٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
verses.transliteration: Fa ulqiyas saharatu sujjadan qaalooo aamannaa bi Rabbi Haaroona wa Moosa

verses.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ ۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ فِى جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخْلِ وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابًا وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ ۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ فِى جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخْلِ وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابًا وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring."
verses.transliteration: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum; innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'allama kumus sihra fala uqatti'anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilaafinw wa la usallibannakum fee juzoo'in nakhli wa lata'lamunna aiyunaaa ashaddu 'azaabanw wa abqaa

segments.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ
segments.translation: He said You believe [to] him before [that] I gave permission to you
segments.transliteration: qāla āmantum lahu qabla an ādhana lakum

segments.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ ۖ
segments.translation: Indeed, he is your chief the one who taught you the magic
segments.transliteration: innahu lakabīrukumu alladhī ʿallamakumu l-siḥ'ra

segments.arabic: فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ فِى جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخْلِ وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابًا وَأَبْقَىٰ
segments.translation: So surely I will cut off your hands and your feet of opposite sides and surely I will crucify you on the trunks of date-palms and surely you will know which of us is more severe in punishment and more lasting
segments.transliteration: fala-uqaṭṭiʿanna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilāfin wala-uṣallibannakum fī judhūʿi l-nakhli walataʿlamunna ayyunā ashaddu ʿadhāban wa-abqā

words.translation: So surely I will cut off
and surely I will crucify you

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنَا ۖ فَٱقْضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍ ۖ إِنَّمَا تَقْضِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَآ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنَا ۖ فَٱقْضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍ ۖ إِنَّمَا تَقْضِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَآ
verses.translation: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life.
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo lan nu'siraka 'alaa maa jaaa'anaa minal baiyinaati wallazee fataranaa faqdi maaa anta qaad; innamaa taqdee haazihil hayaatad dunyaa

segments.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنَا ۖ
segments.translation: They said Never we will prefer you over what has come to us of the clear proofs and the One Who created us
segments.transliteration: qālū lan nu'thiraka ʿalā mā jāanā mina l-bayināti wa-alladhī faṭaranā

segments.arabic: فَٱقْضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍ ۖ
segments.translation: So decree whatever you are decreeing
segments.transliteration: fa-iq'ḍi mā anta qāḍin

segments.arabic: إِنَّمَا تَقْضِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَآ
segments.translation: Only you can decree for this life of the world
segments.transliteration: innamā taqḍī hādhihi l-ḥayata l-dun'yā

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغْفِرَ لَنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَا وَمَآ أَكْرَهْتَنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحْرِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغْفِرَ لَنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَا وَمَآ أَكْرَهْتَنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحْرِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring."
verses.transliteration: Innaaa aamannaa bi Rabbinaa liyaghfira lanaa khataayaanaa wa maaa akrahtanaa 'alaihi minas sihr; wallaahu khairunw waabqaa

segments.arabic: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغْفِرَ لَنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَا وَمَآ أَكْرَهْتَنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحْرِ ۗ
segments.translation: Indeed, [we] we believe in our Lord that He may forgive for us our sins and what you compelled us on it of the magic
segments.transliteration: innā āmannā birabbinā liyaghfira lanā khaṭāyānā wamā akrahtanā ʿalayhi mina l-siḥ'ri

segments.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
segments.translation: And Allah is Best and Ever Lasting
segments.transliteration: wal-lahu khayrun wa-abqā

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأْتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجْرِمًا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأْتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجْرِمًا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live.
verses.transliteration: Innahoo mai yaati Rabbahoo mujriman fa inna lahoo Jahannama laa yamotu feehaa wa laa yahyaa

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَأْتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنًا قَدْ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتُ ٱلْعُلَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَن يَأْتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنًا قَدْ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتُ ٱلْعُلَىٰ
verses.translation: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:
verses.transliteration: Wa mai yaatihee mu'minan qad 'amilas saalihaati fa ulaaa'ika lahumud dara jaatul 'ulaa

verses.arabic: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself.
verses.transliteration: Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; wa zaalika jazaaa'ua man tazakka

segments.arabic: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ
segments.translation: Gardens of Eden flows from underneath them the rivers abiding forever in it
segments.transliteration: jannātu ʿadnin tajrī min taḥtihā l-anhāru khālidīna fīhā

segments.arabic: وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
segments.translation: And that is the reward for him who purifies himself
segments.transliteration: wadhālika jazāu man tazakkā

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى فَٱضْرِبْ لَهُمْ طَرِيقًا فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ يَبَسًا لَّا تَخَـٰفُ دَرَكًا وَلَا تَخْشَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى فَٱضْرِبْ لَهُمْ طَرِيقًا فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ يَبَسًا لَّا تَخَـٰفُ دَرَكًا وَلَا تَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] nor be afraid [of drowning]."
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadee fadrib lahum tareeqan fil bahri yabasal laa takhaafu darakanw wa laa takhshaa

verses.arabic: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ
verses.translation: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,
verses.transliteration: Fa atba'ahum Fir'awnu bijunoodihee faghashiyahum minal yammmi maa ghashi yahum

verses.arabic: وَأَضَلَّ فِرْعَوْنُ قَوْمَهُۥ وَمَا هَدَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَضَلَّ فِرْعَوْنُ قَوْمَهُۥ وَمَا هَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].
verses.transliteration: wa adalla fir'awnu qawmahoo wa maa hadaa

verses.arabic: يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ قَدْ أَنجَيْنَـٰكُم مِّنْ عَدُوِّكُمْ وَوَٰعَدْنَـٰكُمْ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنَ وَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلْوَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ قَدْ أَنجَيْنَـٰكُم مِّنْ عَدُوِّكُمْ وَوَٰعَدْنَـٰكُمْ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنَ وَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلْوَىٰ
verses.translation: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails,
verses.transliteration: Yaa Baneee Israaa'eela qad anjainaakum min 'aduw wikum wa wa'adnaakum jaanibat Tooril aimana wa nazzalnaa 'alaikumul Manna was Salwaa

words.translation: and We made a covenant with you

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبِى ۖ وَمَن يَحْلِلْ عَلَيْهِ غَضَبِى فَقَدْ هَوَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبِى ۖ وَمَن يَحْلِلْ عَلَيْهِ غَضَبِى فَقَدْ هَوَىٰ
verses.translation: [Saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress [or oppress others] therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen."
verses.transliteration: Kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum wa laa tatghaw feehi fa yahilla 'alaikum ghadabee wa mai yahlil 'alaihi ghadabee faqad hawaa

segments.arabic: كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبِى ۖ
segments.translation: Eat of the good things which We have provided you and do not transgress therein lest should descend upon you My Anger
segments.transliteration: kulū min ṭayyibāti mā razaqnākum walā taṭghaw fīhi fayaḥilla ʿalaykum ghaḍabī

segments.arabic: وَمَن يَحْلِلْ عَلَيْهِ غَضَبِى فَقَدْ هَوَىٰ
segments.translation: And whoever on whom descends on whom descends My Anger indeed he has perished
segments.transliteration: waman yaḥlil ʿalayhi ghaḍabī faqad hawā

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى لَغَفَّارٌ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا ثُمَّ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنِّى لَغَفَّارٌ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا ثُمَّ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
verses.translation: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance.
verses.transliteration: Wa innee la Ghaffaarul liman taaba wa aamana wa 'amila saalihan summah tadaa

verses.arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَعْجَلَكَ عَن قَوْمِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ وَمَآ أَعْجَلَكَ عَن قَوْمِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses?"
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa a'jalaka 'an qawmika yaa Moosa

verses.arabic: قَالَ هُمْ أُو۟لَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِى وَعَجِلْتُ إِلَيْكَ رَبِّ لِتَرْضَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ هُمْ أُو۟لَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِى وَعَجِلْتُ إِلَيْكَ رَبِّ لِتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased."
verses.transliteration: Qaala hum ulaaa'i 'alaaa asaree wa 'ajiltu ilaika Rabbi litardaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدْ فَتَنَّا قَوْمَكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدْ فَتَنَّا قَوْمَكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray."
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa innaa qad fatannaa qawmaka mim ba'dika wa adallahumus Saamiriyy

verses.arabic: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ غَضْبَـٰنَ أَسِفًا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَمْ يَعِدْكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ وَعْدًا حَسَنًا ۚ أَفَطَالَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْعَهْدُ أَمْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَأَخْلَفْتُم مَّوْعِدِى
verses.arabicSimple: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ غَضْبَـٰنَ أَسِفًا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَمْ يَعِدْكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ وَعْدًا حَسَنًا ۚ أَفَطَالَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْعَهْدُ أَمْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَأَخْلَفْتُم مَّوْعِدِى
verses.translation: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time [of its fulfillment] too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise [of obedience] to me?"
verses.transliteration: Faraja's Moosaaa ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana asifaa; qaala yaa qawmi alam ya'idkum Rabbukum wa'dan hasanaa; afataala 'alaikumul 'ahdu am arattum ai yahilla 'alaikum ghadabum mir Rabbikum fa akhlaftum maw'idee

segments.arabic: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ غَضْبَـٰنَ أَسِفًا ۚ
segments.translation: Then Musa returned Then Musa returned to his people angry and sorrowful
segments.transliteration: farajaʿa mūsā ilā qawmihi ghaḍbāna asifan

segments.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَمْ يَعِدْكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ وَعْدًا حَسَنًا ۚ
segments.translation: He said O my people Did not promise you your Lord a promise good
segments.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi alam yaʿid'kum rabbukum waʿdan ḥasanan

segments.arabic: أَفَطَالَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْعَهْدُ أَمْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَأَخْلَفْتُم مَّوْعِدِى
segments.translation: Then, did seem long to you the promise or did you desire that descend upon you the Anger of your Lord so you broke the promise to me
segments.transliteration: afaṭāla ʿalaykumu l-ʿahdu am aradttum an yaḥilla ʿalaykum ghaḍabun min rabbikum fa-akhlaftum mawʿidī

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَخْلَفْنَا مَوْعِدَكَ بِمَلْكِنَا وَلَـٰكِنَّا حُمِّلْنَآ أَوْزَارًا مِّن زِينَةِ ٱلْقَوْمِ فَقَذَفْنَـٰهَا فَكَذَٰلِكَ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَخْلَفْنَا مَوْعِدَكَ بِمَلْكِنَا وَلَـٰكِنَّا حُمِّلْنَآ أَوْزَارًا مِّن زِينَةِ ٱلْقَوْمِ فَقَذَفْنَـٰهَا فَكَذَٰلِكَ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ
verses.translation: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people [of Pharaoh], so we threw them [into the fire], and thus did the Samiri throw."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo maaa akhlafnaa maw'idaka bimalkinna wa laakinna hummilnaaa awzaaram min zeenatil qawmi faqazafnaahaa fakazaalika alqas Saamiriyy

verses.arabic: فَأَخْرَجَ لَهُمْ عِجْلًا جَسَدًا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌ فَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ وَإِلَـٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِىَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَخْرَجَ لَهُمْ عِجْلًا جَسَدًا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌ فَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ وَإِلَـٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِىَ
verses.translation: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot."
verses.transliteration: Fa akhraja lahum 'ijlan jasadal lahoo khuwaarun faqaaloo haazaaa ilaahukum wa ilaahu Moosaa fanasee

verses.arabic: أَ��َلَا يَرَوْنَ أَلَّا يَرْجِعُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَوْلًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُ لَهُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا
verses.arabicSimple: أَ��َلَا يَرَوْنَ أَلَّا يَرْجِعُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَوْلًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُ لَهُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا
verses.translation: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit?
verses.transliteration: Afalaa yarawna allaa yarji'u ilaihim qawlanw wa laa yamliku lahum darranw wa laa naf'aa

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ قَالَ لَهُمْ هَـٰرُونُ مِن قَبْلُ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنَّمَا فُتِنتُم بِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَٱتَّبِعُونِى وَأَطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرِى
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ قَالَ لَهُمْ هَـٰرُونُ مِن قَبْلُ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنَّمَا فُتِنتُم بِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَٱتَّبِعُونِى وَأَطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرِى
verses.translation: And Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order."
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad qaala lahum Haaroonu min qablu yaa qawmi innamaa futintum bihee wa inna Rabbakumur Rahmaanu fattabi'oonee wa atee'ooo amree

segments.arabic: وَلَقَدْ قَالَ لَهُمْ هَـٰرُونُ مِن قَبْلُ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنَّمَا فُتِنتُم بِهِۦ ۖ
segments.translation: And verily had said to them Harun before before O my people Only you are being tested by it
segments.transliteration: walaqad qāla lahum hārūnu min qablu yāqawmi innamā futintum bihi

segments.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَٱتَّبِعُونِى وَأَطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرِى
segments.translation: and indeed your Lord is the Most Gracious so follow me and obey my order
segments.transliteration: wa-inna rabbakumu l-raḥmānu fa-ittabiʿūnī wa-aṭīʿū amrī

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَن نَّبْرَحَ عَلَيْهِ عَـٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرْجِعَ إِلَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ لَن نَّبْرَحَ عَلَيْهِ عَـٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرْجِعَ إِلَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo lan nabraha 'alaihi 'aakifeena hattaa yarji'a ilainaa Moosaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰهَـٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذْ رَأَيْتَهُمْ ضَلُّوٓا۟
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ يَـٰهَـٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذْ رَأَيْتَهُمْ ضَلُّوٓا۟
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray,
verses.transliteration: Qaala Yaa Haaroonu maa mana 'aka iz ra aitahum dallooo

verses.arabic: أَلَّا تَتَّبِعَنِ ۖ أَفَعَصَيْتَ أَمْرِى
verses.arabicSimple: أَلَّا تَتَّبِعَنِ ۖ أَفَعَصَيْتَ أَمْرِى
verses.translation: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order?"
verses.transliteration: Allaa tattabi'ani afa'asaita amree

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَبْنَؤُمَّ لَا تَأْخُذْ بِلِحْيَتِى وَلَا بِرَأْسِىٓ ۖ إِنِّى خَشِيتُ أَن تَقُولَ فَرَّقْتَ بَيْنَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَمْ تَرْقُبْ قَوْلِى
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ يَبْنَؤُمَّ لَا تَأْخُذْ بِلِحْيَتِى وَلَا بِرَأْسِىٓ ۖ إِنِّى خَشِيتُ أَن تَقُولَ فَرَّقْتَ بَيْنَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَمْ تَرْقُبْ قَوْلِى
verses.translation: [Aaron] said, "O son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe [or await] my word.' "
verses.transliteration: Qaala yabna'umma laa taakhuz bilihyatee wa laa biraasee innee khashetu an taqoola farraqta baina Baneee Israaa'eela wa lam tarqub qawlee

segments.arabic: قَالَ يَبْنَؤُمَّ لَا تَأْخُذْ بِلِحْيَتِى وَلَا بِرَأْسِىٓ ۖ
segments.translation: He said O son of my mother Do not seize me by my beard and not by my head
segments.transliteration: qāla yabna-umma lā takhudh biliḥ'yatī walā birasī

segments.arabic: إِنِّى خَشِيتُ أَن تَقُولَ فَرَّقْتَ بَيْنَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَمْ تَرْقُبْ قَوْلِى
segments.translation: Indeed, I [I] feared that you would say You caused division between the Children of Israel the Children of Israel and not you respect my word
segments.transliteration: innī khashītu an taqūla farraqta bayna banī is'rāīla walam tarqub qawlī

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكَ يَـٰسَـٰمِرِىُّ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكَ يَـٰسَـٰمِرِىُّ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala famaa khatbuka yaa Saamiriyy

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَصُرْتُ بِمَا لَمْ يَبْصُرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضْتُ قَبْضَةً مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذْتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتْ لِى نَفْسِى
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ بَصُرْتُ بِمَا لَمْ يَبْصُرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضْتُ قَبْضَةً مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذْتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتْ لِى نَفْسِى
verses.translation: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me."
verses.transliteration: Qaala basurtu bimaa lam yabsuroo bihee faqabadtu qabdatam min asarir Rasooli fanabaztuhaa wa kazaalika sawwalat lee nafsee

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱذْهَبْ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّن تُخْلَفَهُۥ ۖ وَٱنظُرْ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَـٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِى ظَلْتَ عَلَيْهِ عَاكِفًا ۖ لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ نَسْفًا
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ فَٱذْهَبْ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّن تُخْلَفَهُۥ ۖ وَٱنظُرْ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَـٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِى ظَلْتَ عَلَيْهِ عَاكِفًا ۖ لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ نَسْفًا
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "Then go. And indeed, it is [decreed] for you in [this] life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast.
verses.transliteration: Qaala fazhab fa inna laka fil hayaati an taqoola laa misaasa wa inna laka maw'idal lan tukhlafahoo wanzur ilaaa ilaahikal lazee zalta 'alaihi 'aakifaa; lanuharriqannnahoo summa lanansifanahoo fil yammi nasfaa

segments.arabic: قَالَ فَٱذْهَبْ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَ ۖ
segments.translation: He said Then go And indeed for you in the life that you will say Do not touch
segments.transliteration: qāla fa-idh'hab fa-inna laka fī l-ḥayati an taqūla lā misāsa

segments.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّن تُخْلَفَهُۥ ۖ
segments.translation: And indeed for you is an appointment never you will fail to keep it
segments.transliteration: wa-inna laka mawʿidan lan tukh'lafahu

segments.arabic: وَٱنظُرْ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَـٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِى ظَلْتَ عَلَيْهِ عَاكِفًا ۖ
segments.translation: And look at your god that which you have remained to it devoted
segments.transliteration: wa-unẓur ilā ilāhika alladhī ẓalta ʿalayhi ʿākifan

segments.arabic: لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ نَسْفًا
segments.translation: Surely we will burn it then certainly we will scatter it in the sea in particles
segments.transliteration: lanuḥarriqannahu thumma lanansifannahu fī l-yami nasfan

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا
verses.translation: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."
verses.transliteration: Innamaaa ilaahukkumul laahul lazee laa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wasi'a kulla shai'in ilmaa

segments.arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ
segments.translation: Only your God is Allah the One there is no god but He
segments.transliteration: innamā ilāhukumu l-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa

segments.arabic: وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا
segments.translation: He has encompassed all things in knowledge
segments.transliteration: wasiʿa kulla shayin ʿil'man

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدْ سَبَقَ ۚ وَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدْ سَبَقَ ۚ وَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an.
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika naqussu 'alaika min ambaaa'i maa qad sabaq; wa qad aatainaaka mil ladunnaa Zikraa

segments.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدْ سَبَقَ ۚ
segments.translation: Thus We relate to you from the news of what has preceded has preceded
segments.transliteration: kadhālika naquṣṣu ʿalayka min anbāi mā qad sabaqa

segments.arabic: وَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكْرًا
segments.translation: And certainly We have given you from Us a Reminder
segments.transliteration: waqad ātaynāka min ladunnā dhik'ran

verses.arabic: مَّنْ أَعْرَضَ عَنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحْمِلُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وِزْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: مَّنْ أَعْرَضَ عَنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحْمِلُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وِزْرًا
verses.translation: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden,
verses.transliteration: Man a'rada 'anhu, fa innahoo yahmilu Yawmal Qiyaamati wizraa

verses.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهِ ۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ حِمْلًا
verses.arabicSimple: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهِ ۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ حِمْلًا
verses.translation: [Abiding] eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load -
verses.transliteration: Khaalideena feehi wa saaa'a lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati himlaa

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ وَنَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ يَوْمَئِذٍ زُرْقًا
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ وَنَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ يَوْمَئِذٍ زُرْقًا
verses.translation: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed.
verses.transliteration: Yawma yunfakhu fissoori wa nahshurul mujrimeena Yawma 'izin zurqaa

segments.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ
segments.translation: The Day will be blown in the Trumpet
segments.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī l-ṣūri

segments.arabic: وَنَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ يَوْمَئِذٍ زُرْقًا
segments.translation: and We will gather the criminals that Day blue-eyed
segments.transliteration: wanaḥshuru l-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin zur'qan

verses.arabic: يَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا عَشْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: يَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا عَشْرًا
verses.translation: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."
verses.transliteration: Yatakhaafatoona bainahum il labistum illaa 'ashraa

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذْ يَقُولُ أَمْثَلُهُمْ طَرِيقَةً إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا يَوْمًا
verses.arabicSimple: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذْ يَقُولُ أَمْثَلُهُمْ طَرِيقَةً إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا يَوْمًا
verses.translation: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day."
verses.transliteration: nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona iz yaqoolu amsaluhum tareeqatan illabistum illaa yawmaa

verses.arabic: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْجِبَالِ فَقُلْ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّى نَسْفًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْجِبَالِ فَقُلْ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّى نَسْفًا
verses.translation: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.
verses.transliteration: Wa yas'aloonaka 'anil jibaali faqul yansifuhaa Rabbee nasfaa

verses.arabic: فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعًا صَفْصَفًا
verses.arabicSimple: فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعًا صَفْصَفًا
verses.translation: And He will leave the earth a level plain;
verses.transliteration: Fa yazaruhaa qaa'an safsafaa

verses.arabic: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجًا وَلَآ أَمْتًا
verses.arabicSimple: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجًا وَلَآ أَمْتًا
verses.translation: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
verses.transliteration: Laa taraa feehaa 'iwajanw wa laaa amtaa

verses.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِىَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥ ۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلْأَصْوَاتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَلَا تَسْمَعُ إِلَّا هَمْسًا
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِىَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥ ۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلْأَصْوَاتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَلَا تَسْمَعُ إِلَّا هَمْسًا
verses.translation: That Day, everyone will follow [the call of] the Caller [with] no deviation therefrom, and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps].
verses.transliteration: Yawma iziny yattabi'oonad daa'iya laa 'iwaja lahoo wa khasha'atil aswaatu lir Rahmaani falaa tasma'u illaa hamsaa

segments.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِىَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥ ۖ
segments.translation: On that Day they will follow the caller no deviation from it
segments.transliteration: yawma-idhin yattabiʿūna l-dāʿiya lā ʿiwaja lahu

segments.arabic: وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلْأَصْوَاتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَلَا تَسْمَعُ إِلَّا هَمْسًا
segments.translation: And will be humbled the voices for the Most Gracious so not you will hear except a faint sound
segments.transliteration: wakhashaʿati l-aṣwātu lilrraḥmāni falā tasmaʿu illā hamsan

verses.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَرَضِىَ لَهُۥ قَوْلًا
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَرَضِىَ لَهُۥ قَوْلًا
verses.translation: That Day, no intercession will benefit except [that of] one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word.
verses.transliteration: Yawma 'izil laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu illaa man azina lahur Rahmaanu wa radiya lahoo qawlaa

verses.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلْمًا
verses.arabicSimple: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلْمًا
verses.translation: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge.
verses.transliteration: Ya'lamu maa bainaa aideehim wa maa khalfahum wa laa yauheetoona bihee 'ilmaa

verses.arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلْوُجُوهُ لِلْحَىِّ ٱلْقَيُّومِ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ حَمَلَ ظُلْمًا
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلْوُجُوهُ لِلْحَىِّ ٱلْقَيُّومِ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ حَمَلَ ظُلْمًا
verses.translation: And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anatil wujoohu lil Haiiyil Qaiyoomi wa qad khaaba man hamala zulmaa

segments.arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلْوُجُوهُ لِلْحَىِّ ٱلْقَيُّومِ ۖ
segments.translation: And will be humbled the faces before the Ever-Living the Self-Subsisting And verily
segments.transliteration: waʿanati l-wujūhu lil'ḥayyi l-qayūmi waqad

segments.arabic: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ حَمَلَ ظُلْمًا
segments.translation: will have failed he who carried wrongdoing
segments.transliteration: khāba man ḥamala ẓul'man

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلْمًا وَلَا هَضْمًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلْمًا وَلَا هَضْمًا
verses.translation: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation.
verses.transliteration: Wa mai ya'mal minas saalihaati wa huwa mu'minun falaa yakhaafu zulmanw wa laa hadmaa

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا وَصَرَّفْنَا فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلْوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ أَوْ يُحْدِثُ لَهُمْ ذِكْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا وَصَرَّفْنَا فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلْوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ أَوْ يُحْدِثُ لَهُمْ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid [sin] or it would cause them remembrance.
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika anzalnaahu Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyanw wa sarrafnaa fee hi minal wa'eedi la'allahum yattaqoona aw yuhdisu lahum zikraa

verses.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ وَلَا تَعْجَلْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يُقْضَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَحْيُهُۥ ۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِى عِلْمًا
verses.arabicSimple: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ وَلَا تَعْجَلْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يُقْضَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَحْيُهُۥ ۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِى عِلْمًا
verses.translation: So high [above all] is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, [O Muhammad], do not hasten with [recitation of] the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge."
verses.transliteration: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; wa laa ta'jal bil Quraani min qabli ai yuqdaaa ilaika wahyuhoo wa qur Rabbi zidnee 'ilmaa

segments.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ
segments.translation: So high above all is Allah the King the True
segments.transliteration: fataʿālā l-lahu l-maliku l-ḥaqu

segments.arabic: وَلَا تَعْجَلْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يُقْضَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَحْيُهُۥ ۖ
segments.translation: And do not hasten with the Quran before before [that] is completed to you its revelation
segments.transliteration: walā taʿjal bil-qur'āni min qabli an yuq'ḍā ilayka waḥyuhu

segments.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِى عِلْمًا
segments.translation: and say My Lord Increase me in knowledge
segments.transliteration: waqul rabbi zid'nī ʿil'man

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ عَهِدْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبْلُ فَنَسِىَ وَلَمْ نَجِدْ لَهُۥ عَزْمًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ عَهِدْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبْلُ فَنَسِىَ وَلَمْ نَجِدْ لَهُۥ عَزْمًا
verses.translation: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'ahidnaaa ilaaa Aadama min qablu fanasiya wa lam najid lahoo 'azmaa

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ
verses.translation: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused.
verses.transliteration: Wa iz qulnaa lilma laaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Iblees; abaa

verses.arabic: فَقُلْنَا يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا عَدُوٌّ لَّكَ وَلِزَوْجِكَ فَلَا يُخْرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ فَتَشْقَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: فَقُلْنَا يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا عَدُوٌّ لَّكَ وَلِزَوْجِكَ فَلَا يُخْرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ فَتَشْقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer.
verses.transliteration: Faqulnaa yaaa Aadamu inna haazaa 'aduwwul laka wa lizawjika falaa yukhrijan nakumaa minal Jannati fatashqaa

verses.arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعْرَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed.
verses.transliteration: Innaa laka allaa tajoo'a feeha wa laa ta'raa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظْمَؤُا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضْحَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظْمَؤُا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضْحَىٰ
verses.translation: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun."
verses.transliteration: Wa annaka laa tazma'u feehaa wa laa tadhaa

verses.arabic: فَوَسْوَسَ إِلَيْهِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ قَالَ يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلْخُلْدِ وَمُلْكٍ لَّا يَبْلَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَوَسْوَسَ إِلَيْهِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ قَالَ يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلْخُلْدِ وَمُلْكٍ لَّا يَبْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate?"
verses.transliteration: Fa waswasa ilaihish Shaitaanu qaala yaaa Aadamu hal adulluka 'alaa shajaratil khuldi wa mulkil laa yablaa

verses.arabic: فَأَكَلَا مِنْهَا فَبَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَكَلَا مِنْهَا فَبَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ
verses.translation: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred.
verses.transliteration: Fa akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw aatuhumaa wa tafiqaa yakhsifaani 'alaihimaa minw waraqil jannah; wa 'asaaa Aadamu Rabbahoo faghawaa

segments.arabic: فَأَكَلَا مِنْهَا فَبَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ
segments.translation: Then they both ate from it so became apparent to them their shame and they began to fasten on themselves from the leaves of Paradise
segments.transliteration: fa-akalā min'hā fabadat lahumā sawātuhumā waṭafiqā yakhṣifāni ʿalayhimā min waraqi l-janati

segments.arabic: وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ
segments.translation: And Adam disobeyed And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred
segments.transliteration: waʿaṣā ādamu rabbahu faghawā

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجْتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ وَهَدَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ ٱجْتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ وَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him].
verses.transliteration: Summaj tabbahu Rabbuhoo fataaba 'alaihi wa hadaa

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱهْبِطَا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۢا ۖ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّى هُدًى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشْقَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ ٱهْبِطَا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۢا ۖ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّى هُدًى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشْقَىٰ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise - all, [your descendants] being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in the world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter].
verses.transliteration: Qaalah bita minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa immaa yaati yannakum minnee hudan famanit taba'a hudaaya falaa yadillu wa laa yashhqaa

segments.arabic: قَالَ ٱهْبِطَا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۢا ۖ
segments.translation: He said Go down from it all
segments.transliteration: qāla ih'biṭā min'hā jamīʿan

segments.arabic: بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ
segments.translation: some of you to others as enemy
segments.transliteration: baʿḍukum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun

segments.arabic: فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّى هُدًى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشْقَىٰ
segments.translation: Then if comes to you from Me guidance then whoever follows My guidance then not he will go astray and not suffer
segments.transliteration: fa-immā yatiyannakum minnī hudan famani ittabaʿa hudāya falā yaḍillu walā yashqā

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ أَعْرَضَ عَن ذِكْرِى فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةً ضَنكًا وَنَحْشُرُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ أَعْمَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَنْ أَعْرَضَ عَن ذِكْرِى فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةً ضَنكًا وَنَحْشُرُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ أَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind."
verses.transliteration: Wa man a'rada 'an Zikree fa inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw wa nahshuruhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati a'maa

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرْتَنِىٓ أَعْمَىٰ وَقَدْ كُنتُ بَصِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرْتَنِىٓ أَعْمَىٰ وَقَدْ كُنتُ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi lima hashar tanee a'maa wa qad kuntu baseeraa

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَا ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ تُنسَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَا ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ تُنسَىٰ
verses.translation: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten."
verses.transliteration: Qaala kazaalika atatka Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa wa kazaalikal Yawma tunsaa

segments.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَا ۖ
segments.translation: He will say Thus came to you Our Signs but you forgot them
segments.transliteration: qāla kadhālika atatka āyātunā fanasītahā

segments.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ تُنسَىٰ
segments.translation: and thus today you will be forgotten
segments.transliteration: wakadhālika l-yawma tunsā

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَنْ أَسْرَفَ وَلَمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.arabicSimple: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَنْ أَسْرَفَ وَلَمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring.
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika najzee man asrafa wa lam yu'mim bi Aayaati Rabbih; wa la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaddu wa abqaa

segments.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَنْ أَسْرَفَ وَلَمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ۚ
segments.translation: And thus We recompense he who transgresses and not believes in the Signs of his Lord
segments.transliteration: wakadhālika najzī man asrafa walam yu'min biāyāti rabbihi

segments.arabic: وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
segments.translation: And surely the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more lasting
segments.transliteration: walaʿadhābu l-ākhirati ashaddu wa-abqā

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَهْدِ لَهُمْ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ يَمْشُونَ فِى مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: أَفَلَمْ يَهْدِ لَهُمْ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ يَمْشُونَ فِى مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
verses.translation: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence.
verses.transliteration: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa qablahum minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil li ulinnuhaa

segments.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَهْدِ لَهُمْ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ يَمْشُونَ فِى مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْ ۗ
segments.translation: Then has not it guided [for] them how many We have destroyed before them of the generations as they walk in their dwellings
segments.transliteration: afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknā qablahum mina l-qurūni yamshūna fī masākinihim

segments.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
segments.translation: Indeed in that surely are Signs for possessors of intelligence
segments.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī l-nuhā

verses.arabic: وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامًا وَأَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامًا وَأَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى
verses.translation: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation [due immediately], and [if not for] a specified term [decreed].
verses.transliteration: Wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika lakaana lizaamanw wa ajalum musammaa

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ غُرُوبِهَا ۖ وَمِنْ ءَانَآئِ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْ وَأَطْرَافَ ٱلنَّهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرْضَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ غُرُوبِهَا ۖ وَمِنْ ءَانَآئِ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْ وَأَطْرَافَ ٱلنَّهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: So be patient over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night [exalt Him] and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied.
verses.transliteration: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi wa qabla ghuroobihaa wa min aanaaa'il laili fasbbih wa atraafan nahaari la 'allaka tardaa

segments.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ غُرُوبِهَا ۖ
segments.translation: So be patient over what they say and glorify with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting
segments.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika qabla ṭulūʿi l-shamsi waqabla ghurūbihā

segments.arabic: وَمِنْ ءَانَآئِ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْ وَأَطْرَافَ ٱلنَّهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرْضَىٰ
segments.translation: and from the hours of the night and glorify at the ends of the day so that you may be satisfied
segments.transliteration: wamin ānāi al-layli fasabbiḥ wa-aṭrāfa l-nahāri laʿallaka tarḍā

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ زَهْرَةَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَرِزْقُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ زَهْرَةَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَرِزْقُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them, [its being but] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa ma matta'na biheee azwajam minhum zahratal hayaatid dunya linaftinahum feeh; wa rizqu Rabbika khairunw wa abqaa

segments.arabic: وَلَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ زَهْرَةَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ
segments.translation: And do not extend your eyes towards what We have given for enjoyment [with it] pairs of them the splendor of the life of the world that We may test them in it
segments.transliteration: walā tamuddanna ʿaynayka ilā mā mattaʿnā bihi azwājan min'hum zahrata l-ḥayati l-dun'yā linaftinahum fīhi

segments.arabic: وَرِزْقُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
segments.translation: And the provision of your Lord is better and more lasting
segments.transliteration: wariz'qu rabbika khayrun wa-abqā

verses.arabic: وَأْمُرْ أَهْلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصْطَبِرْ عَلَيْهَا ۖ لَا نَسْـَٔلُكَ رِزْقًا ۖ نَّحْنُ نَرْزُقُكَ ۗ وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأْمُرْ أَهْلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصْطَبِرْ عَلَيْهَا ۖ لَا نَسْـَٔلُكَ رِزْقًا ۖ نَّحْنُ نَرْزُقُكَ ۗ وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.translation: And enjoin prayer upon your family [and people] and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] outcome is for [those of] righteousness.
verses.transliteration: Waamur ahlaka bis Salaati wastabir 'alaihaa la nas'aluka rizqaa; nahnu narzuquk; wal 'aaqibatu littaqwaa

segments.arabic: وَأْمُرْ أَهْلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصْطَبِرْ عَلَيْهَا ۖ
segments.translation: And enjoin on your family the prayer and be steadfast therein
segments.transliteration: wamur ahlaka bil-ṣalati wa-iṣ'ṭabir ʿalayhā

segments.arabic: لَا نَسْـَٔلُكَ رِزْقًا ۖ
segments.translation: Not We ask you for provision
segments.transliteration: lā nasaluka riz'qan

segments.arabic: نَّحْنُ نَرْزُقُكَ ۗ
segments.translation: We provide for you
segments.transliteration: naḥnu narzuquka

segments.arabic: وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ
segments.translation: and the outcome is for the righteous[ness]
segments.transliteration: wal-ʿāqibatu lilttaqwā

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا يَأْتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓ ۚ أَوَلَمْ تَأْتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا يَأْتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓ ۚ أَوَلَمْ تَأْتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures?
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo law laa yaateenaa bi Aayatim mmir Rabbih; awalam taatihim baiyinatu maa fis suhufil oolaa

segments.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا يَأْتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓ ۚ
segments.translation: And they say Why not he brings us a sign from his Lord
segments.transliteration: waqālū lawlā yatīnā biāyatin min rabbihi

segments.arabic: أَوَلَمْ تَأْتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
segments.translation: Has not come to them evidence of what was in the Scriptures the former
segments.transliteration: awalam tatihim bayyinatu mā fī l-ṣuḥufi l-ūlā

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّآ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِعَذَابٍ مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ لَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لَوْلَآ أَرْسَلْتَ إِلَيْنَا رَسُولًا فَنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَـٰتِكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن نَّذِلَّ وَنَخْزَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَوْ أَنَّآ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِعَذَابٍ مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ لَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لَوْلَآ أَرْسَلْتَ إِلَيْنَا رَسُولًا فَنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَـٰتِكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن نَّذِلَّ وَنَخْزَىٰ
verses.translation: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced?"
verses.transliteration: Wa law annaaa ahlaknaahum bi'azaabim min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi's Aayaatika min qabli an nazilla wa nakhzaa

verses.arabic: قُلْ كُلٌّ مُّتَرَبِّصٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِىِّ وَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
verses.arabicSimple: قُلْ كُلٌّ مُّتَرَبِّصٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِىِّ وَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
verses.translation: Say, "Each [of us] is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided."
verses.transliteration: Qul kullum mutarabbisun fatarabbasoo fasta'lamoona man Ashaabus Siraatis Sawiyyi wa manih tadaa

segments.arabic: قُلْ كُلٌّ مُّتَرَبِّصٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ ۖ
segments.translation: Say Each is waiting so await
segments.transliteration: qul kullun mutarabbiṣun fatarabbaṣū

segments.arabic: فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِىِّ وَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
segments.translation: Then you will know who are the companions of the way [the] even and who is guided
segments.transliteration: fasataʿlamūna man aṣḥābu l-ṣirāṭi l-sawiyi wamani ih'tadā
